author: cerminar
body:
This PR integrates (and supersedes)  #22439

The following features have been added:
1. PCL workflow for PCC correction computation on dedicated ALCARAW
2. Prompt workflow for consumption of the corrections computed by PCL and creation of a new ALCARECO
3. RelVal tests for all of the above (modified existing workflow 1020).
4. ConfigDP scenario to run 1 and 2 @ Tier0
5. equip ConfigDP tests to check the new workflow creation


Still outstanding (but not a showstopper for integration) is the modification of the class https://github.com/cerminar/cmssw/blob/4ccc1b642378fb41911793a1f06a716d9d8c174f/Calibration/LumiAlCaRecoProducers/plugins/CorrPCCProducer.cc 
to produce DQM MEs. @samhiggie @capalmer85 this will need your action to be addressed.
title: Integration of the new Lumi PCC workflow in PCL and Prompt-Reco
